message: Let's be fair, Bob. This gives us both a good deal right now.
Alice, I'm willing to be fair, but the longer this goes on the less valuable the money becomes.  Let's be reasonable - this is a good deal for both of us.
Bob, it's important we reach an agreement soon. This offer still benefits us both.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. My offer is the same as yours, just flipped. Accept this and we both get something before the money shrinks even further!
Bob, let's end this. A 50/50 split is the fairest and most logical solution.  We both benefit equally.
